summary: This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his financial activities. It details the relationships, account ownership, and the financial profiles of Epstein and his associates, including Darren K. Indyke and Jean Anne Brennan Wiebracht. The document highlights the purpose of various accounts and the expected financial inflows and outflows. This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information for various individuals and legal entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It details personal and financial information, including employment, wealth sources, and relationships with Deutsche Bank. The document highlights the financial profiles of Epstein and his associates, as well as the entities they control. This document discusses the due diligence requirements for Client Facing Professionals (CFPs) at Deutsche Bank Americas, emphasizing the importance of knowing the client and documenting their suitability, background, and character. It also includes a declaration for signers regarding the accuracy of the information and the absence of suspicions related to unethical activities.

Epstein's estimated net worth is reported to be over $503 million.

Paul S. Barrett is an investment advisor employed by J.P. Morgan Securities LLC.

The document outlines the responsibilities of Client Facing Professionals (CFPs) in documenting client due diligence.
CFPs must demonstrate knowledge of their clients both at the start of the relationship and continuously.
Signers of the form must declare that they have no suspicions regarding money laundering or unethical activities by the clients.
